titles.title: I KNOW HIM WHOM I'VE BELIVED

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I know him whom I've believed
I know him whom I've believed

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And confident â€“ I am confident
that he is able to guard what has been

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
entrusted to me until that day
entrusted to me 'til that day

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O God you have probed me and you know me
You know when I sit and when I stand

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Glory be to the Father,
and to the Son and to the Holy Spirit

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
As it was in the beginning,
is now and ever shall be world without end. Amen.
